title: Coast to Coast AM - Aug 06 2013 - Consciousness & Dimensions
description:
Description
Date:	08-06-13
Host:	George Noory
Guests:	Dr. Vernon Neppe, Edward R. Close, Rosemary Ellen Guiley
News segment guests: Christian Wilde, Lauren Weinstein

Hour 1: Author and leading expert on the paranormal, Rosemary Ellen Guiley, talked about angels, whom she said could be considered intermediaries between humans and gods, Earth and Heaven. 

Hours 2, 3 & 4: Neuropsychiatrist Dr. Vernon Neppe and physicist Dr. Edward Close discussed their work integrating science and consciousness studies, and their most recent breakthrough, positing that we live in a 9-dimensional spinning reality.

Cry the Beloved Mind: A Voyage of Hope

The Encyclopedia of Ghosts and Spirits
